title: Online Discussion-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge (functions, calculus, statistics, etc.) and experience using online discussion platforms
context.additional_context: Blended classes integrating gamification platforms and Zoom in BYOD environments. Discussion topics focus on real-life application problems.

learning_goals: Learners improve real-world application of mathematical concepts by over 80% through discussion-based problem-solving processes in a gamification environment
Learners increase discussion participation rates by over 50% utilizing competitive elements and leaderboard systems
